LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Knife.label: Knife
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Knife.description: One of humankind's oldest tools, the knife is both an everyday tool and a deadly weapon.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Knife.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Knife.tools.1.label: point
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Bonesaw.label: Bonesaw
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Bonesaw.description: Theres never a dull moment with a doctor armed with this and their favourite phrases at the ready. "Trust me! You won't feel a thing" And "Oops, is this supposed to bleed so much?"
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Bonesaw.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Bonesaw.tools.1.label: blade
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Machete.label: Machete
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Machete.description: Meant to be used for clearing path in dense jungles, Nowadays mostly used for clearing density from someone's shoulders.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Machete.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Machete.tools.1.label: blade
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Machete.tools.2.label: point
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Monkeywrench.label: Monkey Wrench
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Monkeywrench.description: A ginormous wrench, mainly used in spaceship maintenance but could technically be applied to mechanoid disassembly process.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Monkeywrench.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Monkeywrench.tools.1.label: head
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Cleaver.label: Cleaver
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Cleaver.description: Tool designed to separate meat from bones and casting menacing shadows through shower curtains.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Cleaver.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Cleaver.tools.1.label: edge
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Tanto.label: Tanto
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Tanto.description: A single edged dagger type melee weapon.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Tanto.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Tanto.tools.1.label: blade
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Tanto.tools.2.label: point
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Katana.label: Katana
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Katana.description: A modern remake of one-handed samurai sword. Comes with laser sharpening.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Katana.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Katana.tools.1.label: point
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Katana.tools.2.label: edge
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Tsurugi.label: Buster Sword
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Tsurugi.description: A huge two-handed sword designed for elite glitterworld soldiers.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Tsurugi.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Tsurugi.tools.1.label: point
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Tsurugi.tools.2.label: edge
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Sledgehammer.label: Sledgehammer
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_Sledgehammer.description: A large two-handed hammer. Very popular with the muscular crowd.
